btrfs-sxbackup-destroy
===================

Synopsis
--------------

.. autoprogram:: btrfs_sxbackup.cli:parser
    :maxdepth: 1
    :start_command: destroy
    :prog: btrfs-sxbackup

Description
-----------

destroy backup job by removing configuration files from source and destination.
Backup snapshots will be kept on both sides be default.

See also
--------

:manpage:`btrfs-sxbackup(1)`
